title: Mortgages, Private Debt, Banks, and Twitter
itunes:title: Mortgages, Private Debt, Banks, and Twitter
description:
Erica Adelberg, MBS strategist with Bloomberg Intelligence, discusses the mortgage market, interest rates, and the Fed. Vince Cignarella, Global Macro Strategist with Bloomberg News, joins the show for his weekly hit to discuss the stock market, the Fed, and gives his macro outlook. Randy Schwimmer, co-head of lending at Churchill Asset Management, joins the show to talk about the private debt. Mandeep Singh, Senior Technology Analyst with Bloomberg Intelligence, and Ed Ludlow, west coast correspondent with Bloomberg News, discuss Elon Musk, Twitter, and Tesla. Matthew Palazola, Senior Analyst of P&C Insurance with Bloomberg Intelligence, joins the show to discuss the effects of Hurricane Ian and outlook for insurance. Alison Williams, Senior Global Banks and Asset Managers analyst, discusses the latest on Credit Suisse and banks. Priscila Azevedo Rocha, with Bloomberg News, discusses the latest BN story on greenwashing entering the debt market and derailing climate goals. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
